attributes.action: extend the remit of the Telephone Preference Service (TPS) to cover research organisations such as IPSOS-MORI in the same way selling organisations are covered. This will allow users to opt out of more nuisance calls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you are up a ladder wrapped in sticky wall paper, soaking in the bath or hosting a party, a nuisance phone call is a nuisance phone call. It does not mitigate the problem when the caller says he is doing research and is exempt from regulation. It is essential that telephone users have the right to determine who calls them and to eliminate nuisance calls.
